section.p:
If you have a coded missive, immediately.
If not, but you have the codeword Deliver, immediately.
If you have neither, read on.
The soldier recognizes you. He bows and says, ‘Welcome, my lord. I will take you see King Nergan.’
He leads you to Nergan’s mountain stockade, where the king greets you warmly.
‘Ah, my local champion! It is always a pleasure to see you. However, I was hoping you had spoken with General Beladai of the allied army - we need that citadel. Now go. That is a royal command!’
You leave, climbing down to the foothills of the mountains. .
